titleStmt.title: Resolved upon the question by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that the members of this House who serve for the several counties, cities and boroughs, take care forthwith to send to the sheriffs, mayors, bayliffs ... the proclamation for proclaiming of the Kings Majesty
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husbands & Thomas Newcomb,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Tuesday May 8. 1660.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
